## NAME

quarto tools - 

## SYNOPSIS

```bash
quarto tools [OPTIONS]
```

## DESCRIPTION

```

Usage:   quarto tools
Version: 1.8.26      

Description:

  Display the status of Quarto installed dependencies

Options:

  -h, --help  - Show this help.  

Commands:

  help  [command]  - Show this help or the help of a sub-command.

Examples:

  Show tool status: quarto tools
```
